mapper.sql: fact_id, fact_no, fact_name, fact_state, contact_no, email, contact_man1, contact_man2, fact_desc, powerpic_path, apapic_path, shop_id, creator, create_time, modifier, modify_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from oa_factory_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into oa_factory_info (fact_id, fact_no, fact_name, fact_state, contact_no, email, contact_man1, contact_man2, fact_desc, powerpic_path, apapic_path, shop_id, creator, create_time, modifier, modify_time) values (#{factId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{factNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{factName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{factState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactMan1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactMan2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{factDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{powerpicPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apapicPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into oa_factory_info
fact_id,
shop_id,
fact_no,
fact_name,
fact_state,
contact_no,
email,
contact_man1,
contact_man2,
fact_desc,
powerpic_path,
apapic_path,
creator,
create_time,
modifier,
modify_time,
#{factId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{factNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{factName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{factState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{contactNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update oa_factory_info
fact_no = #{factNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fact_name = #{factName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fact_state = #{factState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_no = #{contactNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_man1 = #{contactMan1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_man2 = #{contactMan2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fact_desc = #{factDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
powerpic_path = #{powerpicPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apapic_path = #{apapicPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=INTEGER},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where fact_id = #{factId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update oa_factory_info set shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE fact_id=#{factId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update oa_factory_info set fact_no = #{factNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fact_name = #{factName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fact_state = #{factState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_no = #{contactNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_man1 = #{contactMan1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_man2 = #{contactMan2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fact_desc = #{factDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, powerpic_path = #{powerpicPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apapic_path = #{apapicPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where fact_id = #{factId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select fact_id from oa_factory_info WHERE fact_state=1 order BY create_time ASC

select * from oa_factory_info WHERE fact_state=1 and shop_id IN
#{list}
select count(*) from oa_factory_info where vcode=#{vcode} and fact_id=#{factoryId} and fact_state=1;

select b.fact_id,b.fact_no,b.fact_name,b.contact_no,b.email,b.fact_desc,b.powerpic_path,b.apapic_path,b.shop_id,a.sn,a.shop_name,a.shop_logo,a.shop_type,show_type from t_shop a left join oa_factory_info b on a.id=b.shop_id where b.fact_id=#{factoryId} and b.fact_state=1 and a.`status`=1
select id,title,ads_img,content_type,sn,sort from t_ads where shop_id=#{shopId} and adstype in(2,3) and channel=1 and `status`=1 order by sort limit 0,6

select distinct b.band_id,c.band_name,b.list_ids from oa_agent_band b left join crm_cust_band c on b.band_id= c.band_id left join t_agent_fac d on d.factory_id=b.fact_id and d.agent_id=b.agent_id where c.band_state=1 and d.`status`=1 and d.agent_id=#{agentId} and d.factory_id=#{factoryId} limit 0,6

SELECT DISTINCT ds.brand_id band_id,lists.band_name,lists.list_id,lists.list_id listIds,cpl.list_name,ds.id,ccb.pic_path,cpl.pic_path as listpicpath ,MAX(ois.create_time) as market_time FROM t_goods ds INNER JOIN t_goods_level lev ON ds.id = lev.goods_id INNER JOIN t_agent_fac fac ON fac.level_id = lev.level_id AND fac.status = 1 AND fac.agent_id = #{agentId} INNER JOIN oa_agent_band_lists lists ON lists.list_id = ds.list_id AND ds.brand_id = lists.band_id AND lists.agent_id = #{agentId} AND prod_type = 0 AND lists.fact_id = #{factoryId} AND ds.is_market = 1 AND ds.terminal IN (2, 3) INNER JOIN crm_cust_band ccb ON ccb.band_id = ds.brand_id INNER JOIN crm_prd_list cpl ON lists.list_id = cpl.list_id INNER JOIN oa_item_state ois ON ds.id = ois.item_id GROUP BY ds.list_id ORDER BY fac.create_time asc, market_time desc

select a.band_id as id,a.band_name as name from crm_cust_band as a,oa_factory_info as b where a.band_state=1 and a.shop_id = b.shop_id and b.fact_id=#{factId} and b.fact_state=1 order by a.modify_time desc;

select * from ( select distinct cpl.list_id as id,cpl.list_name as name ,cpl.list_id as listIds, cpl.pic_path from crm_prd_list cpl where list_state=1 and (cpl.list_id in ( select ds.list_id from t_goods ds LEFT JOIN t_goods_level le on ds.id = le.goods_id LEFT JOIN t_agent_fac fac ON le.level_id = fac.level_id INNER JOIN oa_agent_band_lists lists ON ds.list_id = lists.list_id AND lists.agent_id = #{agentId} AND lists.fact_id =#{factoryId} INNER JOIN oa_agent_band ban ON ds.brand_id = ban.band_id AND ban.agent_id = #{agentId} AND ban.fact_id =#{factoryId} WHERE le.`status` = 1 AND ds.terminal in (2,3) AND ds.is_market = 1 AND fac.agent_id = #{agentId} AND fac.factory_id = #{factoryId} and fac.`status` = 1 )
) ) v order by v.id asc limit 0,6

select shop_id from oa_factory_info WHERE fact_state=1 AND fact_id IN
#{list}
select distinct fact_id from oa_factory_info where shop_id = #{shopId}
select * from oa_factory_info where shop_id = #{shopId}
select * from oa_factory_info where fact_id = #{factId}
select fact_id from oa_factory_info where vcode=#{vcode} and fact_name=#{factoryName} and fact_state=1;
